headlines.description: Raul Jimenez scored in the second half to lift Wolverhampton Wanderers to a 1-0 victory over Burnley at the Molineux on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jimenez strikes, Burnley lose fourth in row

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Wolves 1-0 Burnley: Jiminez lifts Wolves

headlines.description: Andriy Yarmolenko scored two first-half goals as West Ham United defeated Everton 3-1 to claim their first Premier League victory of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Yarmolenko doubles as West Ham beat Everton

video.headline: Everton 1-3 West Ham: Toffees hammered at Goodison

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Everton 1-3 West Ham: Toffees hammered at Goodison
